alert.note: Alert for Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 05 at 1:20PM PST until January 07 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO 1 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Mojave Desert Slopes. * WHEN...From 4 PM Saturday to 1 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing dust will reduce visibilities at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highway affected include, but are not limited to Highway 14, Highway 178 below Walker Pass, and Highway 58 below Tehachapi Pass, including the town of Mojave.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.
